I recently got this set and it was actually a LEGO store exclusive here in Singapore
column2: with a reasonable RRP of 29.90 SG

column1: I have actually no clue why LEGO decided to overprice this set in the US but
column2: I am very much Glad they did not do that when pricing in SGD

The addition of the lighthouse was unnecessary but very welcome. I liked how you could hide the crook&rsquo
column2: s stolen treasure inside. The shark and the fish also added to the playability as the LEGO shark is able to swallow the fish entirely!
